title: Creating Miracles w/ Hal Elrod
itunes:title: Creating Miracles w/ Hal Elrod
description:
Episode 570 - The fact that Hal Elrod is still alive is a miracle. He died in a car accident when he was 20 years old and brought back to life after being dead for 6 minutes. Then in 2017 he was diagnosed and overcame an extremely rare from of cancer. How did he do it? A simple formula he calls The Miracle Equation. In this episode, Hal and I discuss his new book called "The Miracle Equation" and amazing book that I recommend you buy right now. It will change your life!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
